text: Sipahioğlu is a Turkish surname. It is derived from Persian سپاهی (sepāhī) with the meaning "soldier". People with the surname include: * Duygu Sipahioğlu (born 1979), Turkish volleyball player * Gökşin Sipahioğlu (1926–2011), Turkish photographer and photojournalist * Halil İbrahim Sipahioğlu (1862–1947), Turkish politician * İlhan Sipahioğlu (1922–1981), Turkish politician ==References== Category:Turkish-language surnames Category:Patronymic surnames
title: Sipahioğlu
